website_summaries.verdict: Callie is more than a pretty face; especially since this hybrid smartphone has a ridiculously long battery life and can easily control your phone’s playlists, camera, and weather app.
pros: Social media, email, and incoming call notifications
An impressive 720 hours of battery life per charge
Measures hours slept, activity, heart rate, etc
cons: While Callie features a swappable band, the hybrid smartwatch itself is only available in rose gold

customer_reviews.title: Easy set-up!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up for this stylish watch/fitness tracker! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Just Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I loved this watch! Only had it for 10 days and now it's not working. Stuck on a certain time. Can't reset and the bad part is that it won't charge on the base. Ugg!! I wanted to reset my password and when the company sent me an email, it went into my spam and I got a warning to not click on the link b/c it was unsecured. Going to return :(
customer_reviews.author: Mark J.

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: For a 150.00 watch I am pretty displeased. The watch and app never stay connected. The touch screen is a pain and is not easy to use. You have to tap and swipe several times for it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Shalee Bayne

customer_reviews.title: good looking and more than you need fitness watch.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it looks pretty and it is customizable. It seems to be accurate. Not familiar with the apps. Still learning
customer_reviews.author: M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: This watch continues to lose connection to my phone. The app and watch appear to be working, but aren't. It says it's syncing, but there's no data there. I've contacted support, but they've been of no help. Most recently, I uninstalled and reinstalled the app, successfully logged in, and all my settings were saved, but NONE of my historic data is there. The watch doesn't hold a memory. If it doesn't sync by midnight, all your data for the day is gone for good.
customer_reviews.author: KATEY B

customer_reviews.title: Don't gdt
customer_reviews.text: The battery only last 3 days. If inactive it has logged me as being asleep. Can't get reminders
customer_reviews.author: Carol AMcClendon

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the seller - won't help if there are issues
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this seller. This would have been a great watch if it didn't break after 3 months of normal use. The buttons on the side stopped working. Can't return to Amazon. Asked seller for an exchange, they dismissed me telling me to contact manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: European Book Treasurer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to sync to iPhone and very stylish. I’ve got several complements on this watch.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with this watch, it was very easy to sync to my iPhone and the app is easy to navigate. I do have to charge it every night but I didn’t plan to wear it to bed anyway. I like the look of this watch better than most smart watches I had researched.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Malone

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: very disappointing I thought it was a winner but you can’t answer calls from it
customer_reviews.author: vero

customer_reviews.title: Step numbers, date, time seem accurate!
customer_reviews.text: The watch is a little heavier than I would have guessed! Has to be recharged every 2 days, resetting needs to be done often,& it is hard to keep a good record of what I bought the watch for! Too many gaps in the information!
customer_reviews.author: Lenore Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Love this watch
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to connect and start working. Much easier than others that I have tried
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased with this Smartwatch
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted!!!! It looks and wears like a normal watch, yet tracks everything a fitbit does plus alerts you to text messages, calls and email just like the apple watch. Most folks dont realize I have a smartwatch on until I tell them.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Poole

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay connected to Android phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking watch and has a cool feature of the clock hands always being visible, but it would lose Bluetooth connection every time the watch was 20'+ from the phone and then would not resync automatically. Every time you would have to go through "pairing mode" which is inconvenient to say the least. Then, Amazon had me return it, but I have not received the money back nor any communication about the status.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D Harrell

customer_reviews.title: helpful
customer_reviews.text: 1st one wouldn't charge. I'm sending it back and they have issued another
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Cute watch, good for step counter
customer_reviews.text: I can’t see messages from my iPhone on this watch it won’t even notify me when I have a text
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item !!
customer_reviews.text: Lightning fasssst shipping!!! Excellent product. Surprise for my wife....I'm having a greaaaat weekend NOW!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jbtaint

customer_reviews.title: Bad communication with app
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back as it wouldn't sync and read activity or heart rate
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Raby

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had the watch since July and now the “smart” part of the watch won’t work do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it’s junk! I’ve had it since March, and it already quit working, and it’s too late to return. I have tried to reset it, refresh it, everything I could think of. It’s pretty much worthless now. I’ll also have to add that the band is somewhat slippery, to where it never wanted to stay put, always came out of the loop.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Inferior watch
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd like watch I purchased and both heated up and didn't hold charge. Blah on this brand. Going to another more reliable brand
customer_reviews.author: Eugene L. Colombini

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY WITH PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Watch keeps losing time and its impossible to reset the time on it
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn DIckerson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my wife and she is a picky person, so when she says she likes it, it must be good.
customer_reviews.author: Merlot

customer_reviews.title: Amazon products work sometimes and it don’t work sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Because it was not turning on when I charge it and the screen was still black When I press the bottom button for 3 min and it didn’t turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Vannicka pan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like the interface and the step counter seems accurate. I wish you could message back but not supported. Over all good buy
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Why haven't you received the watch back
customer_reviews.text: It was not what I had expected I sent the watch to t-e address where ít came from.th@t was the day after I got it. I have:e not heard anything about the return
customer_reviews.author: phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Keeping time and trusting work out stats
customer_reviews.text: Everyday use and doesn't keep time anymore. Very disappointed its past return date.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra LaRose

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the packaging of the product.. and so far I'm very happy with the watch and how easy it was to set up..
customer_reviews.author: Melissa turner

customer_reviews.title: Great for teens
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for my 14 yr old daughter. She loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great smart watch for under 100$
customer_reviews.text: So far so good I've had it one day & I really love it !
customer_reviews.author: Sierra L Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch, works great.
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this watch. I can keep an eye on the time and easily check my texts and emails without taking my phone out. It tracks my steps, heart rate, activity, calories burned, distance walked, sleep, and even the weather. The app. is easy to use. This is the best smart watch I've had so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nouse4aname

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch
customer_reviews.text: This was a very nice looking smart watch. But it did not let you return calls or text. But I should have read all information on it before ordering. Send back and ordered Samsung galaxy and love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pippin

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality, features and battery life of this watch. I can go 5 days without charging it. love the find my phone feature. Weather, activity tracking, stop watch etc. The font is way too tiny on texts and emails but it is readable. Controlling spotify from phone is handy. Beautiful watch. Nice to always see hands even without waking up digital screen by pushing button. Then it just looks like a beautiful regular watch.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon P.

customer_reviews.title: It's a no from me
customer_reviews.text: I would not suggest purchasing this watch unless it's for only fitness type of purposes. It would only periodically notify me of messages or calls. It looks nice, I love the look and Rose gold but it's not worth the price I paid ($100). It is also a finicky on how you charge it. If it was like $50 I would probably suggest it but again only for tracking steps or work outslike a fit bit. I don't think i's not $100 plus you would want to purchase a screen protector for it.
customer_reviews.author: Livz

customer_reviews.title: Smart watch
customer_reviews.text: Most everything I've liked except it seems the pulse rate doesn't work correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara H.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WATCH
customer_reviews.text: I love my new watch. It does everything as advertised!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Shipton

customer_reviews.title: Handle screen with care.
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch and that there are so many watch screen changes you can do, even customized one.
customer_reviews.author: latoya

product_meta.title: 3Plus Callie Hybrid SmartWatch for Women, 30+ Day Battery | Heart Rate Monitor, Pedometer, TFT Vibrant Display, Sleep Tracker, Calorie/Step Counter, Music Controls, for iPhone and Android | Rose Gold
product_meta.description: The 3Plus Callie Smart Watch is part of 3Plus' new line of Hybrid womens smart watches that feature an Activity Tracker, Pedometer, Sleep Monitor, Heart Rate Monitor, Multisport Tracker, Elevation Tracker and Distance Tracker. The 3Plus Callie is designed for women who are physically demanding in the gym while needing something to look great for the everyday. This ladies waterproof smartwatch boasts physical watch hands and a vibrant color smart touch screen display. The Callie fitness gear is made for tougher sports like swimming and cycling while still being intelligent enough to track running distance and heart rate. By incorporating key features of a smartwatch with the traditional hands of an analog watch, you have access to a number of phone features with the look of a luxury watch. Read and receive your text messages, social media notifications, calendar alerts and call alerts all on the Callie to always stay in touch with friends and family. The Callie helps you track your heart rate, steps, calories burned, distance traveled and active minutes during the day and can measure the quality of your sleep at night to maximize workouts, improve health, and reach goals. Features mechanical watch hands on top of a colorful smart touch screen with a variety of customizable displays perfect for a day at the office or workout at the gym. Daily activity tracking keeps track of calories burned, steps walked, and distance traveled with built in heart rate monitor, sleep tracking and ability to record workouts to improve health. Receive and read text messages, social media notifications, calendar alerts, incoming and missed call alerts to never miss an important moment. Designed with a sleek stainless steel case, 39mm watch face, 3 ATM water resistance, comfortable and durable beige wristband for quick magnetic charging and long-lasting battery life. Compatible with iOS 8. 0 + and Android 5.0 + phones with the ability to control music, camera functions, and view weather.
feature_bullets: Features mechanical watch hands on top of a colorful smart touch screen with a variety of customizable displays perfect for a day at the office or workout at the gym
Daily activity tracking keeps track of calories burned, steps walked, and distance traveled with built in heart rate monitor, sleep tracking and ability to record workouts to improve health
Receive and read text messages, social media notifications, calendar alerts, incoming and missed call alerts to never miss an important moment
Designed with a sleek stainless steel case, 39mm watch face, 3 ATM water resistance, comfortable and durable beige wristband for quick magnetic charging and long-lasting battery life
Compatible with iOS 8. 0 + and Android 5. 0 + phones with the ability to control music, camera functions, and view weather
